Oklahoma_City.Metro Technology Centers: Metro Technology Centers is a public career and technology education center located in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma and is part of the Oklahoma Department of Career and Technology Education system. Metro Tech provides 30 full-time programs to high school students and adults, over 500 short-term and online courses and customized training for business and industry employees. Others services include career and business counseling, assessment, financial aid, employment services, academic centers, ESL, child care, disability services and bus transportation.
